thread.title: Cubs' Kyle Schwarber bats leadoff vs. Reds
thread.title_full: Cubs' Kyle Schwarber bats leadoff vs. Reds - Chicago Tribune

author: Mark Gonzales
title: Cubs' Kyle Schwarber bats leadoff vs. Reds
text:
Joe Maddon has been adamant about giving his position players rest in preparation for the playoffs, but the Chicago Cubs' manager is taking matters one step further.
Leadoff batter Dexter Fowler won't start Wednesday night against the Cincinnati Reds. The bigger surprise is that rookie Kyle Schwarber will bat leadoff for only the second time this season.
Schwarber batted leadoff at San Francisco on Aug. 26, going 2-for-4 with a infield double and stolen base.
Austin Jackson will bat second and play center field. Right fielder Jorge Soler, who is 5-for-21 since returning from the disabled list on Sept. 17, will bat sixth and play right field.
Here's the Cubs' lineup:
Schwarber lf
Jackson cf
Bryant 3b
Rizzo 1b
Castro 2b
Soler rf
Russell ss
Ross c
Lester p
Privacy Policy Kyle Schwarber Chicago Cubs Dexter Fowler Joe Maddon Cincinnati Reds Jorge Soler
